attributes.action: Work Only for Us - No more MPs working on the side.
attributes.additional_details:
Members of Parliament(MPs) on just the 'Basic' MPs salary (£67,000) without expenses, are in the top quarter of earners in the Country.  They maintain their status of moral and social aloofness above their employers..... Us.
No MP is able to be rewarded, in any way, for work which is not constitutence work as either a Member or Minister. This includes all types of directorship, any advisory to companies and individuals and access to fellow members of the Government.
